results.name: a(n) = n OR A005187(floor(n/2)), where OR is bitwise-or (A003986).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
formula: a(n) = n OR A005187(floor(n/2)), where OR is bitwise-or (A003986).
mathematica: A[n_]:=2*n - DigitCount[2*n, 2, 1]; Table[BitOr[n, A[Floor[n/2]]], {n,0,100}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 25 2017 *)
program: (Scheme) (define (A283996 n) (A003986bi n (A005187 (floor->exact (/ n 2))))) ;; Where A003986bi implements bitwise-OR (A003986).
print([n|A(n//2) for n in range(101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 25 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 19 2017
